1.title: Trial by Rat
1.plot: A family displaced by fire is ready to move into their new home when Mike and the Isotech team discover the house is infested with rats. A man rents a room that is filled with bees. JD gets a late night call to save a couple from invading rodents.

2.title: Roman Goes Vegan
2.plot: Roman faces a massive rat infestation - at a vegan stronghold. A female rookie tech is put to the test. Gary and Mike knock out a large problem of small pests.

3.title: Gator Bait
3.plot: In Florida, JD and Joey take on an 11-foot alligator living in a woman's backyard. Rats invade an animal sanctuary. Mike and the entire Isotech crew go head to head with a flock of peacocks.

4.title: Rats! Bats!
4.plot: Rats invade a vacant home and the new owner turns to Mike and Kat for help. JD and Mike team up to capture a wild Cayman when it moves into a family's pond. Bats drive a woman insane and it's up to Mike and Roman to evict the winged pests.

5.title: Bed Bugs Bite!
5.plot: Mike and the team travel to a bed bug infested apartment complex in Bakersfield to save a family in trouble. JD tracks a very large pest, terrifying a lonely widow.

6.title: Wild West Skunks
6.plot: Mike and the team travel to Arizona to save a small town overrun with skunks. Gary faces an infestation of German roaches alone. Mike gets a lesson in rattlesnake wrangling.

7.title: Deadly Desert
7.plot: Mike, Roman and Jamie run into a new breed of rat at a desert compound. The team takes on Killer Bees take at a suburban home. Mike goes on a nocturnal scorpion hunt.

8.title: Polly Wants Revenge
8.plot: JD tracks a raccoon that killed a beloved family pet. Mike searches for the source of a bedbug infestation. Roman almost loses it during a "green" treatment.

9.title: Lights! Camera! Vermin!
9.plot: Gary helps a horror director get over his fear of rats and spiders. Mike, Santos and Roman battle rats, black widows and skunks at the home of an aspiring actress.

10.title: Emergency! Closure!
10.plot: Mike faces an impossible deadline saving a restaurant. Roman knocks out a desert rodent infestation. Jamie tells a homeowner she caused her own infestation.

11.title: Holy Bees!
11.plot: Roman must over come his fear of bees when they swarm a small town church. Mike tests his newest recruit, Matt, in a roach infested kitchen. Mike tackles a cluttered home overrun with a family of rats.

12.title: Mr. Whisker's Was a Rat
12.plot: Matt come to the rescue when a kitchen remodeling reveals vermin behind the walls. A mother turns to Maddie, the bed bug dog, when her family gets bitten in the night. Kat takes on a hive of angry bees and her own co-workers.

13.title: They're Not Your Friends
13.plot: A mother get a wake up call when rats threaten her daughter. A bird lover is at her wits end when roaches invade her home. Roman helps a divorce whose kitchen is overrun by roaches.

1.title: Night at the Races
1.plot: Mike and the team take on a massive rat infestation at a race track, tackle an apartment swarming with roaches, bring in K-9 reinforcement for suspected bed-bugs, and discover one frightened homeowner's rat problem is much worse than she ever imagined.

2.title: Rookie Mistakes
2.plot: Mike loses his cool when one of the rookies almost blows up a building, so he sets up a tough job to make sure he has the right stuff. Bedbugs litter an apartment to an unimaginable degree. And a homeowner finds out the solution to her problem.

3.title: The Hills Have Rats
3.plot: "Killer" bees threaten a day care center. Mike brings his best rat-catcher to track down the enemy at a Hollywood Hills mansion. A woman finally faces the severity of her roach problem. Mike plays psychologist for a customer.

4.title: Moby Rat
4.plot: A large rat eludes Mike and J.D. while at the same time, the animal loving homeowner struggles with the decision to use an exterminator. Miguel helps out a single mother that has roaches threatening the health of her children.

5.title: Infestation Nation
5.plot: Mike and the team take out a high-flying hive of bees, track down rats living the high life, and save a restaurant from a roach invasion. Jamie and Gary track an elusive skunk while Mike and Oliver discover more than roaches at a cluttered apartment.

6.title: Return of the Rat
6.plot: Jamie returns to a former client to track down one last rat. Miguel and Roman do a roach cleanout on their favorite restaurant. Mike and the team help a woman being attacked by bedbugs and a couple whose artwork is being devoured.

7.title: Hollywood Roaches
7.plot: A newbie is tested with a pigeon job and joins Mike on one of the most disgusting roach jobs he has ever seen. Joey and the guys track down a family of rats living it up at a Hollywood studio. Mike boards a boat under siege by a hoard of hungry termites.

8.title: Horror Attic
8.plot: Mike and the team attack the most disgusting pigeon infestation they have ever encountered. Roman faces a homeowner who doesn't want the rats in his attack hurt. During a skunk removal, Oliver pays a smelly price for being an exterminator.

9.title: Roach Motel
9.plot: Roman squeezes through tight spaces in pursuit of rats. An apartment building is overrun with roaches, but the source of the infestation blows even Mike away. The Verminators go to great heights to solve a pigeon problem at a historical church.

10.title: Roach Motherload
10.plot: The Verminators quash a roach infestation that is threatening a child's health. Jamie faces his fears on a black widow job. Mike deploys the full arsenal to track some rats. Gary doesn't let a wall stand in his way when it comes to taking out termites.

11.title: No Kill Solution
11.plot: A homeowner is reduced to tears after the Verminators take out her mice. Mike and JD revisit animal-loving Geralyn to save a hive of bees in her backyard. The entire team is called out to deal with a house overrun by pigeons, termites, spiders and mice.

12.title: Plague of Vermin
12.plot: A homeowner is in denial about how bad her mouse problem has become. The Verminators are shocked by the plague of pests they find at an apartment complex. Emotions run high when a woman calls in the team to save her pack-rat grandfather from roaches.

13.title: Day of the Rat
13.plot: A shooting gallery erupts as Roman and Santos take out generations of rats running wild in an attic. Santos traps rats and black widows with older brother Joey. Roman tracks a mysterious infestation with his rodent-hunting hero.

imdb.plot outline: Bedbugs, Spiders, Rats, Roaches and Termites are waging a deadly war against mankind. Standing between them and us is the VERMINATORS. Each episode follows Mike Masterson and his hand-selected team as they do the job that frightens - but fascinates - almost everyone. Alternatively creepy, gross and fun, it becomes clear along the way that there is more than meets the eye in the battle against pests.
imdb.title: Verminators
plot: Bedbugs, Spiders, Rats, Roaches and Termites are waging a deadly war against mankind. Standing between them and us is the VERMINATORS. Each episode follows Mike Masterson and his hand-selected team as they do the job that frightens - but fascinates - almost everyone. Alternatively creepy, gross and fun, it becomes clear along the way that there is more than meets the eye in the battle against pests.
